entry.title: Pre Class 2: Website
entry.content: In the second pre-class of the Fab Academy at the FabLab Cascina we concentrated on creating static websites via Jekyll and GitHub. If you are reading this, I accomplished my homework.

entry.title: Welcome to Fab Academy
entry.content: In our first and second prep classes for Fab Academy 2015 the Fablab Cascina team spent two evenings this week learning to use GIT/HG ad hosting a static website on GitHub. If you are reading this our mission was accomplished.
